subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: David Nalbandian, of Argentina, who had missed about 12 of the past 15 months because of injuries, beat Marcos Baghdatis of Cyprus, 6-2, 7-6 (4), in the final in Washington.
snippet: David Nalbandian, of Argentina, who had missed about 12 of the past 15 months because of injuries, beat Marcos Baghdatis of Cyprus, 6-2, 7-6 (4), in the final in Washington.
